org.opends.server.workflowelement.localbackend

Class LocalBackendBindOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.core.OperationWrapper<BindOperation>
      • org.opends.server.core.BindOperationWrapper
        • org.opends.server.workflowelement.localbackend.LocalBackendBindOperation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, BindOperation, Operation, PluginOperation, PostOperationBindOperation, PostOperationOperation, PostResponseBindOperation, PreOperationBindOperation, PreOperationOperation

    public class LocalBackendBindOperation
extends BindOperationWrapper
implements PreOperationBindOperation, PostOperationBindOperation, PostResponseBindOperation
    This class defines an operation used to bind against the Directory Server, with the bound user entry within a local backend.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Backend backend
      The backend in which the bind operation should be processed.
      protected DN bindDN
      The bind DN provided by the client.
      protected boolean executePostOpPlugins
      Indicates whether to execute post-operation plugins.
      protected boolean isFirstWarning
      Indicates whether the bind response should include the first warning for an upcoming password expiration.
      protected boolean isGraceLogin
      Indicates whether this bind is using a grace login for the user.
      protected PluginConfigManager pluginConfigManager
      The plugin config manager for the Directory Server.

      • Fields inherited from interface org.opends.server.types.Operation

        LOCALBACKENDOPERATIONS

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalBackendBindOperation(BindOperation bind)
      Creates a new operation that may be used to bind where the bound user entry is stored in a local backend of the Directory Server.

      • processLocalBind

        public void processLocalBind(LocalBackendWorkflowElement wfe)
        Process this bind operation in a local backend.
        Parameters:

      • processSimpleBind

        protected boolean processSimpleBind()
                             throws DirectoryException
        Performs the processing necessary for a simple bind operation.
        Returns:
        true if processing should continue for the operation, or false if not.
        Throws:
        DirectoryException - If a problem occurs that should cause the bind operation to fail.

      • processAnonymousSimpleBind

        protected boolean processAnonymousSimpleBind()
                                      throws DirectoryException
        Performs the processing necessary for an anonymous simple bind.
        Returns:
        true if processing should continue for the operation, or false if not.
        Throws:
        DirectoryException - If a problem occurs that should cause the bind operation to fail.

      • checkPasswordPolicyState

        protected void checkPasswordPolicyState(Entry userEntry,
                            SASLMechanismHandler<?> saslHandler)
                                 throws DirectoryException
        Validates a number of password policy state constraints for the user.
        Parameters:
        userEntry - The entry for the user that is authenticating.
        saslHandler - The SASL mechanism handler if this is a SASL bind, or null for a simple bind.
        Throws:
        DirectoryException - If a problem occurs that should cause the bind to fail.

      • setResourceLimits

        protected void setResourceLimits(Entry userEntry)
        Sets resource limits for the authenticated user.
        Parameters:
        userEntry - The entry for the authenticated user.
